name: Mavuika
desc:
"Night-Igniting Flame" Mavuika

The brightest, most splendid, most resplendent flame reborn.

value.name: Humanity's Name Unfettered
value.desc:
Mavuika: "Humanity's Name" Unfettered

"Light of the blazing sun!"

value.text: Reward for inviting Mavuika to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

value.name: Mavuika
value.desc: The leader of Natlan who inherited the Ancient Name of "Kiongozi." She made a vow to illuminate the future of the nation of war with the Sacred Flame.

customize.name: Mavuika
customize.desc:
"Night-Igniting Flame" Mavuika

The brightest, most splendid, most resplendent flame reborn.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"You want to play cards? Alright, then let's begin."
<color=#ece5d8>Hint: Mavuika's deck is built around Techniques and Nightsoul points. She also has Fighting Spirit — a unique mechanic.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Mavuika
customize.desc:
"Night-Igniting Flame" Mavuika

The brightest, most splendid, most resplendent flame reborn.

customize.name: Xilonen
customize.desc:
"Ardent Flames Forge the Soul" Xilonen

The peaks resound, their golden veins gleaming.

customize.name: Citlali
customize.desc:
"Obsidian Opalstar" Citlali

The vivid night-wind flows, obsidian reflects the heart.

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
This character enters <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul's Blessing</color> and gains 2 <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul points</color> . <color=#ffffff>Select</color> 1 card from 3 <color=#ffffff>Flamestrider</color> cards to add to your Hand.
<color=#ece5d8>Nightsoul's Blessing</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
The character to which this is attached accumulates <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul points</color> . (Max 2 points)
When the character has 0 Nightsoul points, they exit <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul's Blessing</color> .

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
This character enters <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul's Blessing</color> , gains 1 <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul point</color> , and consumes all of their Fighting Spirit. They then deal <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> to the opponent's active character equal to the Fighting Spirit consumed.
If 6 points of <color=#ffffff>Fighting Spirit</color> are consumed, attach <color=#ffffff>Crucible of Death and Life</color> to this character.
<color=#ece5d8>Nightsoul's Blessing</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
The character to which this is attached accumulates <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul points</color> . (Max 2 points)
When the character has 0 Nightsoul points, they exit <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul's Blessing</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Crucible of Death and Life</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
All your characters' Skills no longer consume <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul points</color> .
All your characters' <color=#ffffff>Normal Attacks</color> deal +1 DMG.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 2</color>

<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
This character cannot gain <color=#ffffff>Energy</color> .
Each time your characters consume <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul points</color> or use Normal Attacks, gain 1 Fighting Spirit.
When this character uses an <color=#ffffff>Elemental Skill</color> or <color=#ffffff>Elemental Burst</color> , attach <color=#ffffff>All-Fire Armaments: Ring of Searing Radiance</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>All-Fire Armaments: Ring of Searing Radiance</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>After another of your characters uses a Normal Attack or Technique:</color> <color=#ffffff>Mavuika</color> consumes 1 <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul point</color> and deals 1 <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> . (Destroys self after <color=#ffffff>Mavuika</color> exits <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul's Blessing</color> .)

<color=#ffd780>Equipment Card</color>
<color=#ffffff>When this card has 0 Usages remaining:</color> Draw 4 cards.
<color=#ffffff>Technique:</color> Full Throttle (Only usable by <color=#ffffff>Mavuika</color> )
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 2</color>
(A character can only equip 1 Technique at a time)

<color=#ffd780>Technique</color>
Consumes 1 <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul</color> point, then performs " <color=#ffffff>Prepare Skill</color> " for <color=#ffffff>Flamestrider: Full Throttle</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Flamestrider: Full Throttle</color>
<color=#ffffff>At the start of the Action Phase:</color> Create 2 Omni Dice.

<color=#ffd780>Equipment Card</color>
<color=#ffffff>After you Discard this card:</color> Deal 1 <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> to the opponent's active character.
<color=#ffffff>Technique:</color> Soaring Ascent (Only usable by <color=#ffffff>Mavuika</color> )
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 2</color>
(A character can only equip 1 Technique at a time)

<color=#ffd780>Equipment Card</color>
<color=#ffffff>When this card is played:</color> Randomly trigger the "End Phase" effect of one of your Summons.
<color=#ffffff>Technique:</color> Blazing Trail (Only usable by <color=#ffffff>Mavuika</color> )
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 2</color>
(A character can only equip 1 technique at a time)

<color=#ffd780>Technique</color>
Switch to your next character and convert 2 Elemental Dice to <color=#ffffff>Omni Element</color> . (You can continue your action after using this Skill)

Applies Pyro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Melt</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Vaporize</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Overloaded</color> : DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Burning</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Burning Flame</color> ] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Select</color>
Select 1 card from a specific number of cards and activate its effects.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
<color=#ece5d8>Technique</color>
When the active character is equipped with a Technique card, they can use the corresponding Technique.
Using a Technique counts as a Combat Action. If the character is unable to use Skills due to conditions like Frozen, Petrification, or Stun, they are also unable to use the Technique.
Using a Technique is not considered as using a Skill. Therefore, it cannot trigger effects such as "After using a skill" or "After the character triggers an Elemental Reaction." Damage dealt by using a Technique is not considered Damage dealt by the character.
<color=#ece5d8>Discard</color>
Use Action Cards or Character Skill effects to Discard Action Cards from Hand or Deck.
<color=#ece5d8>Prepare Skill</color>
Some Skills cannot be used directly. Instead, they need to be <color=#ffffff>prepared</color> over a certain number of turns.
When it is a certain player's turn, and this player's active character is currently <color=#ffffff>preparing</color> a Skill, this player's turn will be skipped. If the Skill has finished being <color=#ffffff>prepared</color> , the character will directly use that Skill at this time. (Skills that require <color=#ffffff>preparing</color> cannot activate effects triggered by "using a Skill" or "triggering an Elemental Reaction" or other such effects.)
Only active characters can <color=#ffffff>prepare</color> Skills, and if an active character who is <color=#ffffff>preparing</color> a Skill gets switched off-field, their <color=#ffffff>preparation</color> will be interrupted.
<color=#ece5d8>Omni Element</color>
The Omni Element can be considered as any kind of element, and can be used to pay for costs of various kinds.
